    padding: 0%;

}

html {
    scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

body {
background-color: white;
}

.navbar {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    position: sticky;
    top: 0%;
    animation-name: borderani;
    animation-duration: 10s;
    transition: all 0.5s;
    animation-iteration-count: infinite;
}

@keyframes borderani {
    0% {
        border-bottom: solid 1px red;
        box-shadow: 0.1px 0.1px 0.1px 2.1px red;
    }

    10% {
        border-bottom: solid 1px rgb(255, 0, 170);
        box-shadow: 0.1px 0.1px 0.1px 2.1px;
    }

    20% {
        border-bottom: solid 1px rgb(0, 17, 255);
        box-shadow: 0.1px 0.1px 0.1px 2.1px;
    }

    30% {
        border-bottom: solid 1px red;
        box-shadow: 0.1px 0.1px 0.1px 2.1px;
    }

    40% {
        border-bottom: solid 1px rgb(255, 0, 212);
        box-shadow: 0.1px 0.1px 0.1px 2.1px;
    }

    50% {
        border-bottom: solid 1px rgb(0, 17, 255);
        box-shadow: 0.1px 0.1px 0.1px 2.1px;
    }

    60% {
        border-bottom: solid 1px rgb(255, 0, 247);
        box-shadow: 0.1px 0.1px 0.1px 2.1px rgb(106, 194, 106);
    }

    70% {
        border-bottom: solid 1px rgb(0, 17, 255);
        box-shadow: 0.1px 0.1px 0.1px 2.1px blue;
    }

    80% {
        border-bottom: solid 1px red;
        box-shadow: 0.1px 0.1px 0.1px 2.1px red;
    }

    90% {
        border-bottom: solid 1px rgb(0, 255, 140);

    }

    100% {
        border-bottom: solid 1px rgb(0, 17, 255);
        box-shadow: 0.1px 0.1px 0.1px 2.1px rgb(0, 17, 255);
    }
}

.background {
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.621) url("https://wallpaperaccess.com/full/247202.jpg");
    background-size: cover;
    background-blend-mode: darken;
    height: 100%;
}

.nav-list {
    width: 50%;
    /* display: flex; */
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(10px,1fr)) ; 

    
    align-items: center;
    margin-left: 56px;
}

    list-style: none;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 20px 26px;
}

    text-decoration: none;

    padding: 2px;
    border: solid 2px rgba(255, 0, 0, 0);
}

    text-decoration: none;
    color: antiquewhite;
    transition: all 0.5s;
    border-radius: 5px;
    border-bottom: solid 2px rgb(248, 250, 248);
